Name: Treasure Hunter VR
About the game: Welcome to Treasure Hunter VR! In this virtual reality game, you will be equipped with a metal detector and be sent to hunt for treasure. Using money you collect from the treasure, you can unlock different maps and metal detectors. Each map (5 in total) has its own accompanying relaxing music. These songs were created by Brandon Yates. We hope that you enjoy playing Treasure Hunter VR!
